bluej.codecoverage.utils

Class CoverageListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • bluej.codecoverage.utils.CoverageListener

  • public class CoverageListener
extends java.lang.Object
    Backend for collecting coverage information from the java agent. This class triggers a dump of all collected coverage information when requested, serializes it, then returns an objectinputstream to the caller to deserialize the data.
    Author:
    ikingsbu
    See Also:
    CoverageBridge

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  CoverageListener.Handler
      Manages all interactions with the jacoco agent by sending requests and receiving responses from a local port.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoverageListener(int port)

    • Method Detail

      • getResults

        public java.io.ObjectInputStream getResults(java.io.File file)
        Creates an InputStream to Serialize the Coverage information so that it can be used in a different ClassLoder.
        Parameters:
        file - base directory to search for classes who should be included in the returned coverage metrics.
        Returns:
        InputStream containing CoveragePackages
